title: Synthesis of dendrimer stabilized high-density silver nanoparticles on reduced graphene oxide for catalytic and antibacterial properties
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00284A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Thi Nhat Thang Nguyen, Subodh Kumar, Xuan Thang Cao
Study explores depositing silver nanoparticles onto dendrimer-functionalized reduced graphene oxide via a Diels–Alder reaction, analyzing dendrimer branching's impacts on AgNP loading, nitro-reduction, and antibacterial properties.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
